The second trailer for ‚ÄúNew Papa‚Äù is released - the sequel to ‚ÄúYoung Papa‚Äù with Jude Law and John Malkovich
04 Nov 2019, 10:50 by Daria Gromova
Dad is dying, long live dad.
HBO has released a new teaser trailer for New Dad, the sequel to the popular Young Dad series. In the video, Pius XIII (aka Lenny, aka Jude Law) falls into a coma, and he finds a replacement in the form of the character of John Malkovich, who should become no less an eccentric pontiff.



It is expected that director Paolo Sorrentino will continue to study and show the audience "the world of the modern papacy." In September, the series was pre-screened at the Venice Film Festival and, as The Guardian writes, the new season came out ‚Äúas rich, amazing and mysterious.‚Äù
The premiere will take place in November on Sky Atlantic, on the HBO series will be shown only in January 2020. In total, 9 episodes are waiting for us.
